original_text: Then Jesus asked the teacher of God's Law a question. He said, ‘Three men saw the man that was lying on the road. Which of them showed love to him, like a real friend?’
korean_text: 네 생각에는 이 세 사람 중에 누가 강도 만난 자의 이웃이 되겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus asked the teacher of God's Law a question
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 하나님의 율법 교사에게 질문을 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: that was lying on the road
Which of them showed love to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 누가 그를 향해 사랑을 보였습니까
